caption.p: Molecular structure of 1 (left, hydrogen atoms are omitted for clarity) and 2 (right) with ellipsoids set at 50 % probability. Selected distances [Å] and angles [°] of 1: As1−Fe1 2.4406(8), As1−Si1 2.3823(11), As1−Si2 2.3717(12), As1−Si3 2.3780(12) and 2 (major part) [Å]: As1−As2 2.3680(5), As1−Fe1 2.5004(5), As2−Fe1 2.4907(5); C2−Fe1−C4 104.71(12), As1−Fe1−As2 56.645(14).
